name: beaver-habit-tracker
description: BeaverHabits is a self-hosted habit tracker that features streaks, graphs, and customizable habit schedules. It is designed to help users build routines and stay motivated using simple tracking and visual cues.

features.title: Habit Tracking
features.description: Build and maintain positive habits. Consistent progress

features.title: Streak Monitoring
features.description: Track consecutive days of habit completion. Stay motivated

features.title: Visual Graphs
features.description: See your progress with charts and visualizations. Clear insights

features.title: Custom Schedules
features.description: Set flexible habit schedules and frequencies. Personalized tracking

features.title: Motivation Tools
features.description: Visual cues keep you motivated. Build momentum

features.title: Routine Building
features.description: Develop consistent daily routines. Better habits

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your habit data completely private. Personal growth

features.title: Simple Tracking
features.description: Easy logging of daily habits. Minimal friction
